name: List Group - With d-flex
heading: list-group with d-flex
description: List groups are a flexible and powerful component for displaying a series of content. Modify and extend them to support just about any content within.
usage: Add nearly any HTML within, even for linked list groups like the one below, with the help of flexbox utilities.
